exams.title: KỲ THI TỐT NGHIỆP THPT NĂM 2025 - Môn TIẾNG ANH (Mã đề 1102)
exams.description: Đề thi chính thức. Thời gian: 50 phút.
exams.subject: Tiếng Anh

readingPassages.title: Passage 1 (Q1–Q8): Project Farming
readingPassages.content: When several farmers merge plots into a single “project farm”, they use digital tools to make that teamwork far more effective. GPS mapping, drones, and in-field sensors build a live, shared picture of soil types, weather shifts, and plant growth. Because everyone works on the same data, the team can settle seeding dates, determine when to spray, and track machinery in real time. What once depended on guesswork is now driven by verifiable information.

readingPassages.title: News (Q9–Q14): DIFF 2025
readingPassages.content:
Da Nang International Fireworks Festival (DIFF) 2025

With ten teams worldwide, DIFF 2025 features the largest (9) _______ of participating teams in its history...

questions.content: The word settle in paragraph 1 mostly means _______.
questions.explanation: Trong ngữ cảnh này, settle có nghĩa là quyết định (decide).

questions.content: Which of the following is NOT mentioned in paragraph 1...?
questions.explanation: Drones là công cụ, không phải thông tin được hiển thị.

questions.content: With ten teams worldwide, DIFF 2025 features the largest (9) _______ of participating teams...
questions.explanation: Dùng 'number' cho danh từ đếm được (teams).
